import { useState } from 'react' import { Row, Col, Card, Button, Image, Nav, Badge } from 'react-bootstrap' import { datePrettifier } from '../../utils/date' export const ArticlePreview = function (props) { const [language, setLanguage] = useState("ita") return (
setLanguage("ita")}> setLanguage("eng")} >
{language === "ita" ? props.article.ita.title : props.article.eng.title} {language === "ita" ? props.article.ita.subtitle : props.article.eng.subtitle} {props.article.authors.map((author, i) => { return ({props.article.authors.length > 1 ? " • " + author + "\n" : " • " + author} ) })} {props.article[language].tags.map(tag => {tag})} {datePrettifier(props.article.date, language)} ) }
